"Dhruv," a shrill voice calls out over the crowd, "Do you have the map of the ancient Thar Desert?"  It's your boss Ragini, head archaeologist on this treasure-seeking expedition. You stare at the curled parchment in your hand, supposedly leading to a legendary artifact buried beneath the desert for centuries.

1. Hand over the map to Ragini.
2. Question Ragini about the importance of the map.
3. Hold onto the map and study it closer.
4. Inform the team about the map.
